com.lucaslouca.service

Class LLRailRoadServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucaslouca.service.LLRailRoadServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LLRailRoadService

    public class LLRailRoadServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LLRailRoadService
    LLRailRoadServiceImpl implements the LLRailRoadService Interface.

    It makes use of LLTownMap. Although most functionality in LLRailRoadServiceImpl is cascaded to LLTownMap, the idea of providing LLRailRoadServiceImpl is to separate the functionality between a service system and a map. That is, LLRailRoadServiceImpl could be expanded to support further functionality such as requestClosingHours() or nextTrainDepartureTime() without the need to modify the LLTownMap.
